description: These home made crackers are packed full of spice and flavour.
name: Homemade Fire Crackers with Garlic, Onion Powder, Paprika & Dill Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 170Â°C. In a large Ziplock bag or similar, put the crackers inside and smash/grind until all large pieces are broken down.
Now empty the rest of the contents into the bag and combine together while shaking and bashing for 3 minutes or so.
Line a baking tray with some baking paper and empty the content out. Flatten the mixture as evenly as possible ensuring no gaps in the mixture.

Using a pizza cutter, slice the mixture into the cracker size you would like and then bake in the oven for 15 minutes or until nicely browned. Remove from the heat and serve with a choice of condiments.
